imdb.plot outline: Music superstar Kelis Rogers is about to drop her new album "Food" and it's time to celebrate by hosting a dinner party for her inner circle. Kelis starts the day with her publicist Katherine to discuss the marketing strategy for the new album. Meanwhile, Kelis' assistant Tiffany heads to her favorite cheese shop to grab a key ingredient for dessert. On her way home, Kelis swings by her local spice shop to grab some fresh, exotic spices. Back in the kitchen, Kelis joins forces with her friend Robbi to prepare a spectacular meal featuring jerk ribs, shrimp fricassee and goat cheese ice cream.
imdb.title: Saucy & Sweet
